definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: The flywheels of some engines also carry marks indicating the serial numbers of the cylinders where the compression occurs.
sentences.chinese: 有些发动机的飞轮标有在压缩行程的汽缸序号。

sentences.english: Remove the upper flywheel and converter housing bolts and loosen the bottom bolts.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸上部飞轮及转换器外壳螺栓，拧松底部螺栓。

sentences.english: It is only when the clutch disc is slipping against the flywheel that wearing occurs.
sentences.chinese: 只有当离合器盘在飞轮上打滑时，才会出现磨损现象。

sentences.english: It is no problem to keep a ceramic flywheel appropriately magnetised.
sentences.chinese: 磁化陶瓷引擎的飞轮不存在任何问题。

sentences.english: The flywheel is a relatively heavy metal wheel, which is firmly attached to the crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 飞轮是一个相当重的金属轮盘，飞轮与曲轴紧相连。

sentences.english: The flywheel is a relatively heavy metal wheel, which is firmly attached to the crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 飞轮是一个相当重的金属轮盘，飞轮与曲轴紧相连。

sentences.english: The main object of the third chapter is to design the dual mass flywheel (DMFW).
sentences.chinese: 第三章主要目的是设计双质量飞轮减振器。

sentences.english: Fahrenheit will be going to Macau on the 26th and Singapore on the 27th.
sentences.chinese: 飞轮海将于26号抵达澳门，27号到新加坡去。

sentences.english: Port diesel generator flywheel guard missing.
sentences.chinese: 左舷发电机飞轮罩没有了。

sentences.english: The layout optimization of stiffeners for engine flywheel housing of a truck was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了载货汽车发动机飞轮壳加强筋的布置优化设计。

sentences.english: The result is that both flywheel and pressure plate rotate together.
sentences.chinese: 压盘与飞轮连接，这样飞轮和压盘一起旋转。

sentences.english: The result is that both flywheel and pressure plate rotate together.
sentences.chinese: 压盘与飞轮连接，这样飞轮和压盘一起旋转。

sentences.english: And this toy car has a flywheel.
In this case, I cannot convert linear motion into the flywheel.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，我不能把直线动能转化到飞轮上。

sentences.english: The theory of flywheel energy storage and its application are introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了飞轮储能技术的基本原理和应用。

definition: rotating disk/wheel/rotor/cycle of reincarnation in Buddhism
